description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.rpaon3jF3nCe5eP9]{Theorem (Ex)}

Through extensive biochemical treatments, you’ve permanently reinforced your bones, making it less taxing to carry heavy loads and helping you resist catastrophic harm. Your bulk carrying limit increases by 2, and you don’t become @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.JGFn4MrDZ6X5vrzU]{fatigued} from the long-term effects of living in a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.n461i9lDXw303SiY#high-gravity]{high-gravity} environment. You gain a +2 bonus to saving throws made to resist the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj.JournalEntryPage.zOJ86MDq6kNzAAbB#wound]{wound} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj.JournalEntryPage.zOJ86MDq6kNzAAbB#severe-wound]{severe wound} critical hit effects, as well as other effects that would sever or mutilate your limbs.

modifiers.name: Thickened Bones (Ex)
modifiers.notes: You gain a +2 bonus to saving throws made to resist the wound and severe wound critical hit effects, as well as other effects that would sever or mutilate your limbs.
